item.title: Shader Breakdown - LCD Display
item.description: 🏗️ 正在翻译中。在此之前请先阅读英文的版本。 This post is the breakdown of LCD display shader. Source code for Unity URP is provided. Github Source Code After reading this shader tutorial by Alan Zucconi, I decided to make my own version of LCD display shader. This effect itself is quiet simple, when viewing from distance, the LCD display act identical as a standard emissive material. But once you move close enough to the display, you can see the individual pixels of the LCD screen.
